title: In Real Life
description: Archie Corrigan has finally accepted his sexuality, but being out in secret, and out in real life, are two totally different things.  The pressure of meeting Landon’s entire family is building, added to by the fact they’re still hung up on Landon’s ex boyfriend. He’s all broad shoulders and tanned Australian muscle, with seemingly zero respect for Archie and Landon’s relationship.Plus he can give Landon the one thing Archie isn’t sure he’s comfortable with. Because being in a relationship, will eventually lead to more than just kissing. And in real life, that might be more than he signed up for.
author: S.M.   James
